title: Piedmont 350 Dahlen Boston or Lundgren Chicago
author: zrickkid

posts.post_title: Piedmont 350 Dahlen Boston or Lundgren Chicago
posts.post_content: Anyone have a decently priced or beater Bill Dahlen Boston or Carl Lundgren Chicago Piedmont 350 for sale?

Hey, I have a Dahlen/Boston SGC 50 for sale for $95 and a Lundgren/Chicago  SGC 40 for sale for $290.  Let me know if you're interested and I'll e-mail scans.

Marty
im looking for the piedmont 350 backs.
